name: Horde robbery
description:
Task:

Your task is simple. You need to steal a treasure from a horde of orcs and escape. You have three items: health potion, land mine and decoy. Health potion will restore your health. Land mine will detonate on a step of an orc. Decoy can capture attention of orcs for a while.

Attention - all orcs will be alerted when you will grab a treasure, so use items carefully and plan your escape route.

Controls:

w, a, s, d - movement;

q, e - selection of item;

Left mouse button - attack;

Hold right mouse button for a 2 second to use a selected item

Used technology:

Source code of a project can be found here - https://github.com/ENgineE777/HordeRobbery

This game is powered by Oak game engine (https://github.com/ENgineE777/OakEngine)

Almost everything is data driven and can be changed in the editor. Light 2D system was used for making the right atmosphere. AI utilize state machine and can switch back to a patrol mode after pursuing of a player.

Credits:

All art, gameplay code, gamedesign and game engine were made by ENgineE777
